review_text: It's a very pretty, cozy and clean place. The neighborhood is safe and beautiful with large trees and flowers during spring time. The location is just perfect as there are a lot of restaurants, cafes and shops near by. It's not far from Mt.Tabor as well and the bus stops are just a few minutes walk from the house. Highly-recommended place to stay in Portland.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Ruby’s place and found it to be comfortable, quiet, and convenient. Street parking was plentiful and right near the entrance. Ruby recommended some great restaurants within walking distance which we found to be a hit!

Ruby’s place was so wonderful and cozy. The decorations and the rugs were exquisite, a warm and homey space. The basement/apartment is located in the center of Portland with great restaurants near by. I would only keep in mind to read the description CAREFULLY, the ceilings are super super low and is not ideal of tall people who are staying long visits. The kitchen was short-staffed in some amenities like plates and pans. But the space was perfect for a short amazing trip.
Ruby was super responsive and a great host!

Cute, clean, and convenient! A great stay overall. Very walkable and parking was easy too. I recomend tall people heed the warning about low ceilings, but for the average to short crowd, its an excellent place.

I had a wonderful 6-week stay here. Ruby was very attentive, kind and responsive. I have severe allergies and although the apartment is on the lower level, it is very clean, there is an air purifier and I had no issues with allergies. The bed was extremely comfortable with plenty of clean blankets. I particularly liked the kitchen, which has a full size fridge and enough utensils and cookware for my needs. I felt very safe here because the entrance is behind a tall gate and fence.
I struggled with getting enough light, but that is expected for a basement apartment and it is still getting dark early. There is also some noise from upstairs, but it didn't bother me and I was still able to get work done.
Overall I had a great stay and am happy to recommend it!

Ruby's place is really nice, very comfortable. We got into the city really early and Ruby messaged us we could come check in a bit early, which was really generous. There was a huge winter storm during our stay, so we stayed inside to escape the cold, and the apartment was relaxing. We also appreciated how responsive she was and making sure we had everything we needed.
This place was gorgeous! Very low ceilings though, but amazing location. Easy access to portland and not too far from downtown. Ruby responded as soon as possible. Definitely recommend!

I chose Ruby’s place for the excellent location, which is just a few blocks from my daughter and son-in-law, and stayed over the Christmas holiday. Cozy, lots of ambient lighting, very comfy bed. As noted, you are in a basement apt with a family living upstairs, so expect to hear some footsteps, but it was quite peaceful at night, I slept well; I wasn’t there during the day much. Well appointed kitchen with coffee, tea, etc, it had what I needed. Shower and bathroom are on the smaller side, which is clearly mentioned in the description, I made it work just fine, but it might be not ideal for super tall people. Good value for the rate, responsive host, lots of bar/restaurant/food carts nearby. Very ‘Portland’ vibe. I’d have liked to see the garden and plants in spring or summer, it looks like it would be quite lush, but it’s a cozy spot in winter.
Wonderful place for a quick getaway
Great place. Great location. Great host.
Great great place and a nice deal. Ruby was very kind and extremely ocamadating. Highly recommend!
A beautiful little basement cottage in a nice part of town. Perfect.

I loved the Art Apartment! A friend visited me and said it seemed like I lived there, I was so at home in the space. It was just perfect for my needs-- quiet, charming and peaceful, in a very walkable neighborhood with lots of gorgeous trees and plenty of restaurants and bars on Hawthorne, a 10-15 minute walk from the apartment. Mt Tabor park is a super pleasant long-ish walk away, which was perfect for me on one of the dry Fall mornings. The only thing missing was a bath tub, but that's okay! I would still absolutely stay at Ruby's place (or her other listing, a cute cottage on the property) again any time. <3
A sweet, perfectly Portland hideaway
Love the place, feels magical. I would love to book this place again. It was a cold night, and the heater warmed up the whole place. Very hot shower, very enjoyable. A little home, away from home.
loved this art apartment, the backyard was charming and easy to access, the bed was comfortable and I loved the neighborhood.
Portland all the way
Very good communication from Ruby! Very nice place in a great neighborhood with lots of restaurants close by. Very clean and comfortable and quiet. Really enjoyed our stay! Thank you!
Dark and cozy! Very clean and had everything we needed for a quick overnight stay.
Cozy. Quiet. Walkable neighborhoods. Very enjoyable stay.
Ruby was a great host! Super friendly and responsive!
We had a great stay at Rubys. Would stay here again!

This place was perfect for us. It is beautifully appointed, with comfy furniture, a well stocked kitchenette, and lovely art throughout. I especially appreciated all the cool rugs on the floor, and the thoughtful lighting. The back yard is very sweet, and chock full of interesting plants and sculptures. Everything felt well-loved and heartfelt. Ruby was very friendly when we needed to interact, but otherwise gave us total privacy. And the location is fabulous, right in between Hawthorne and Division, there are probably 100 great restaurants, bars, shops and other attractions within 15 minutes easy stroll. Loved this spot and recommend it highly to anyone who wants an authentic Portland experience. Thanks Ruby!

Fun and eclectic place. Live the garden and courtyard which were peaceful and quiet. The interior was full of fun touches, and had all the needed amenities. Perfect location near everything. Would definitely recommend this place.
Ruby’s place is walkable to great restaurants and shops. Cool (in the heatwave) apartment, comfortable, great bed. Ruby’s recommendations and communication were excellent. We loved our stay!

Ruby was incredibly responsive. We needed internet access for a class that extended past check out and she found a way to accommodate both our needs and those of the next guests. I love her space - so comfortable.
Ruby’s spot is great! The apartment is cozy in a beautiful garden and funky space. The location in Portland is super walkable and close to lots of good food. Would definitely recommend!

Such a beautiful spot and Ruby was great with communication. The location was also perfect, in between Hawthorne and Division Street with lots of shops and eats around. Would definitely recommend this place and would love to come back again!
Very cozy, sweet neighborhood. Stay here!
Ruby’s place was beautiful and she was a great host. Flexible to what I may need and has a very peaceful apartment to stay in. Thank you Ruby!

Comfortable and equipped basement apartment in an excellent location for walking to restaurants, shops and bars. The drinks and snacks were a great touch! However the outdoor area is a common space shared with the host and other air bnb guests so it didn’t feel very private. Additionally the sauna pictured in the photos is not accessible to use so it felt a little misleading. Some attention to detail to be desired. Over all we still had a pleasant stay.
Ruby’s place was clean and cozy, and in a great location. She was a lovely, communicative host. We would definitely stay again!
Ruby’s place was excellent! Perfect location to explore the city of Portland and the surrounding areas! Ruby is also so sweet and down to earth. Will be staying with her again when in Portland!
Beautifully furnished and decorated hideaway in a great walkable location. We would definitely stay here again!
The stay had a very nice backyard/garden area. Access to the room/back gate was easy and the downstairs it self was very comfortable

The apartment is clean, well furnished, and allows you to be completely isolated throughout the stay in Portland. With that being said, Ruby was very communicative over text throughout our time and gave us ample warning of if there might be extra noise. Definitely recommend!

Wow! What a gem of a place! Seriously, if you're visiting Portland, this is where you need to be. A short walk from Hawthorne Street will fill a weeks worth of adventures alone... Ruby is an excellent host with amazing communications and friendly tips. And she has a sauna and outside shower! What a treat that was. The place was spotless and had some snacks and beverages (our favorite Polar Water) for us as well. The ceiling is a little low if you're a taller person, but otherwise an amazing spot. We stayed for a week and loved ever minute of the cozy space. Thanks, Ruby!

Ruby’s place was great! It was neat, clean and cozy with a most comfortable bed. The neighborhood was beautiful and close to restaurants, shops, and public transit. I would highly recommend it to any visitors to Portland.
Great place. I wasn’t convinced about being in basement but it was really pretty and cool (literally and figuratively). The host has great taste!

Super cute basement studio! Perfect weekend spot for me and my partner to explore Portland. In between Hawthorne and Division/Clinton so it was super easy to walk to both areas. Ruby was also very responsive and constantly checked to make sure we were comfortable. Highly highly recommend!
Lovely place to stay!

Ruby was a very accommodating and helpful host who responded promptly. The space is cozy and comfortable and has plenty of amenities. The neighborhood is quiet and close to shopping, restaurants and public transportation. I highly recommend this listing.
Ruby’s space was so beautiful, cozy, and creatively inspiring! It was a perfect home away from home, and the ideal location and proximity to all the goodness that Portland has to offer!
Great space in a really lovely neighborhood! The sauna and outdoor shower was a really nice bonus

Ruby's Art Apartment is within a private and secure setting, and the location is in one of Portland's most beautiful and convenient neighborhoods. We chose it because of its close proximity to people we were visiting, and the ability to walk safely to and from there even late at night, around the neighborhood, and out for coffee and meals, allowed for a sense of freedom we would not have had otherwise.
Ruby was an excellent communicator and we agree with the many reviews that mentioned the comfortable bed!

Worked out very well. Not far from downtown and Ruby has a beautiful yard and cozy basement apartment. Would definitely stay again. Ruby is also a Masseuse and my wife was able to get a massage with her. She highly recommends getting one as well. I went into the sauna during that time which was great. Ruby also offered great recommendations on restaurants and a hiking spot that would accommodate my wife’s limited mobility. The apartment had everything we could possibly need: extra pillows, blankets, toiletries, towels, travel books/magazines, games, iron and ironing board, French press, kettle, microwave, toaster oven, hair dryer, coffee and tea, and even essential oils for the diffuser. Everything was clean and decorated beautifully. Bed was comfortable with some of the softest sheets I’ve ever slept on. Nice fluffy pillows on the bed and sofa, too. The basement was quiet—no need to worry about it being too noisy from the house above. This was our favorite airbnb stay yet! Book it!

Ruby's Art Apartment is great! It's cozy and comfortable. We had a vey relaxing time. The Apartment is a short walk to lots of great shops and restaurants. We will definitely stay here again. Thank you, Ruby!

You enter through a gated garden space which immediately made us feel welcome. Great cozy space to relax, extremely comfortable bed!
We used the pullout bed too, and I was also a comfortable sleep.
We loved it so much we recommend it to friends that checked in the minute we checked out!

Ruby's place is lovely and cozy! Although she was on her vacation when we stayed there, she was super responsive to any questions and even offered a flexible arrival/departure time. My 2 children and I stayed there and enjoyed the space, trampoline, sauna, and neighborhood. It was just like the pictures/description! The pull out sofa bed looked a little lumpy but my 10 yr old slept soundly on it without a complaint!
Exactly as described, beautiful neighborhood! Would stay again in the future.
Cozy and creatively furnished, Ruby's Art Apartment was a charm!

What a gem in a wonderful neighborhood, beautiful sauna and space to relax just moments away from some of my favorite restaurants in Portland. Exceeded my
Expectations and will be returning. If this spot is open, book it, you won’t regret it.
Great location, helpful host, and lovely place to stay!
My sister and I enjoyed our stay... the space was cozy and we loved the artwork and decor.
Great location with plenty of places you can walk to. Host is friendly and helpful. Place is as advertised and felt comfy.

This apartment and the yard are absolutely beautiful! The bed is THE MOST COMFORTABLE bed I have ever slept in. Ruby has thought of everything and then some. The art is not something just thrown up on a wall but actual gallery quality work. There were some essential oils available and the place smelled delightful. This was a much needed get away and I felt wrapped in a hug from the moment I arrived. I will stay with Ruby every time I go to Portland from now on. Just loved it!!
My daughter and I enjoyed our weekend stay in this cozy, charming, comfortable space.

Checkin was easy, and the electronic locks made coming and going very simple! Host was very responsive and communicative about any issues that may have arisen throughout the stay. Location is within a 5 minute walk from tons of great activities, no car necessary to enjoy the city!
Great hosts and a lovely place to stay!
I loved about the artist studio and I cant wait to go back !

This space was perfect for my son and I after a visit to OMSI. It was in a safe neighborhood, with plenty of parking. Clean and cozy, it felt just like home. We loved the art, the essential oils and the vibe. Close to New Seasons market and Hawthorne fun, it was a perfect place for our visit. Hardly noticed we were in a basement. Highly recommend.

Ruby's place is just as described and pictured. Super easy to find, lovely neighborhood to walk about and a warm, cozy & comfortable little space. We enjoyed playing records while we cooked simple meals. Wish we would have had time to stay longer and enjoy the sauna since it was freezing when we were passing through town! Ruby is super responsive to messages - we had no issues at all. Thank you for the great stay! We enjoyed the lovely space you created.

Wonderful area and awesome place to stay. Ruby has the space set up perfectly! We visited Hawthorne theatre just a few blocks away and the neighborhood was quiet, family friendly and clean! We felt safe, relaxed, and loved sitting in the back yard space. Would book again!
Awesome little basement apartment! Ruby was an amazing host!
Ruby’s place was a delight! Very private and right by all of our favorite spots.

Ruby’s place is so cute and cozy, and walking distance to some wonderful shops and coffee places. It was especially cold and windy during my trip and she took extra care to make sure I was warm enough!
I highly recommend staying at Ruby’s if you find yourself in Portland!

My mom and I had a wonderful time staying at Ruby's "Art Apartment." It was super comfy and cozy and we really appreciated how well supplied it was, with everything from coffee to kitchen utensils to laundry facilities. We also appreciated the cool art--in every corner! Communication with our host was prompt and friendly. We would love to stay here again next time we visit Portland!
Great place in a really nice neighborhood. Easy walking distance to Hawthorne. Close to everything
Thank you! I just loved it there!

My friends and I had an amazing stay at Ruby's home. The space was clean, cozy, and inviting. The tea, coffee and snacks were a huge perk after long flights to PDX! Ruby was very accommodating to a later check-out time requested by one of my friends, who was not feeling well towards the end of the trip, and needed a few extra hours to sleep in before her flight home. I highly recommend this spot!
We loved this Place. Ruby was a great host. The location is amazing, walking distance from restaurants and shops that we enjoyed the most in Portland. We’d definitely stay here again!

We came up to Portland from Eugene for a concert at the Hawthorne Theater. It was the perfect distance for walking and was super safe. The apartment was adorable!! Super quiet and clean. Couldn’t ask for anything better.
An adorable place in a great location! Easy check-in and great communication from the host. It will be the first place I try to stay the next time we’re in Portland.

Ruby’s home is great for anyone visiting Portland! It is in the perfect location with Hawthorne and Division within walking distance and downtown is only a 10-15 min drive away. Ruby was very responsive during my stay and her space was very cozy and welcoming. Would definitely recommend!
Wonderful place

Ruby’s place was very comfortable, great communication, special extra touches and care that made us feel very much at home. The place was stocked with amenities and beautiful decor. The location really can’t be beat, SE Hawthorne, Mt. Tabor, and direct access to downtown.

Great location, and suite. Ruby was wonderful and the check- in was easy. Hawthorn area is Fab! I gave a 4 for cost/ value as the city charges 2 taxes, so the owner gets way less than 1/2 of the end cost. This I did not think was fair and is not my usual experience with renting in Air bnb? Thanks Ruby!
Great location, bed was comfortable, neighborhood felt safe, not far from good food

Thanks again Ruby for making my bday special without even knowing you
All the best

Ruby was amazing with communication, and her place was super nice, clean, and enjoyable. We really liked that she had essential oils, and the art apartment had cool little things about it that made it perfect and cozy. Highly recommend staying here!!! We will be back.

We had a quick and wonderful stay at Rubys place. Excellent communication and a lovely touch with welcome chocolates and dining recommendations. Would recommend staying here if you want to be in walking distance of all the great food, bars and shops of Hawethorn and Division! Lots of privacy in her beautifully decorated guest house. 😊

We really enjoyed our stay. Ruby was super easy to communicate with, we felt welcome. The apartment is very comfortable, had a great design and everything we needed. A bonus is the delightful backyard and patio.

We enjoyed our stay. I slept well. The bed was comfy and the space was clean. The art was very interesting too. My sisters and I spent a lot of time looking at it and chatting about it. I highly recommend this little gem. Its very close to shopping and food. Check it out! I will stay there again.
Very nice, comfortable, clean, and everything you need for your stay…also close for coffee at stump town (recommended).

Such a quaint place, wonderful Oregon vibes. The neighborhood was safe and quiet, the asthetic of the suite was perfect. Comfortable beds. Kind host! If you are taller, this may not be the best fit (literally) just gotta watch your head. I would stay again :) the sauna was beautiful and so relaxing. Everything I wanted and needed!

Ruby has created a beautiful and peaceful place! Everything I needed was there, including some quiet solitude that I was needing. The space is gorgeous -- amazing artwork and incredibly comfortable. I would absolutely stay again :))

This place was so adorable! Perfect location and walking distance to Division and Hawthorne areas. Check in was easy and we loved the personal note Ruby left us. It was four of us and it didnt feel too small, but we only used the space to sleep. Highly recommend!
Great and cozy place!
My sister and I had a lovely stay in Ruby's art apartment! It was so peaceful and relaxing. We also love how close it was to the vintage shops in Hawthorne!

We really enjoyed our stay here! It’s a quick walk to either Hawthorne or Division Street and either have a lot to offer. The apartment itself is clean and comfortable and honestly, has one of the most comfortable beds I’ve slept in at an Airbnb. Ruby is wonderful and we would definitely stay here again!
What a great place. We loved how cozy the art apartment was and all the special details. The patio is totally great, we felt we were living in a creative space. Ruby was responsive and helpful.

So well remodeled and clean. Ceilings are pretty low so watch yourself if you’re tall. Easy walking distance to things and also close to the bus lines if you’re wanting to venture out further and on the cheap. Ruby provides a lot of sweet touches like a handwritten card and treats and the space was just really cozy and well decorated. Outdoor lighting was a little bright for sleeping but otherwise such a lovely stay!
Wonderful, private spot near Hawthorne. Highly recommend!

My friends and I had a wonderful time staying at Ruby’s. She is an excellent host with great communication. We felt very welcome! The Airbnb is in a great location and the neighborhood felt very safe. We would return in a heartbeat.
I can only dream to have lived in a cute little place like this when I was a single girl!
Wonderful place to stay. Beautiful neighborhood and a beautiful yard. Ruby’s place is very comfortable. Ruby provided many thoughtful extras. We will definitely book again. Thank you Ruby.

Our stay at Ruby's was short but sweet (we were only there one night but quite enjoyed it!). The neighborhood is cute and quiet and is walking distance to cafes/shops/restaurants/etc. Parking was easy and the space was clean and is decorated nicely and thoughtfully. There were 4 of us and for a short stay there was plenty of space. The chocolates and essential oil diffuser were great touches to make us feel at home.

A very cute ground level apartment, full of art, music and aromatherapy (candles and essential oils). Nestled in a good neighborhood close to main roads and east to park near.
You’ll walk through the backyard garden to find your entrance and then your inside the unit. There is a lower ceiling clearing of 7 feet that dips down to 6 feet which isn’t that big a deal. Big comfy bed and some houseplants to make it feel homey.

This was a lovely space with a lovely attentive hostess.One of my favorite places to date! We can’t wait to come back. It’s located close to grocery stores, great restaurants, record stores and vintage shops- all at a walking distance. We loved the vibe! Thank you Ruby ! ☺️
Ruby’s basement apartment was cute and quaint accessible via a magical little yard backyard. Great location and she even gave us good recommendations on food in the area.
Cute and cozy basement apartment in a wonderful Portland neighborhood. Easy walking distance to some fantastic food and parks. Great place for a walking and eating weekend!

Wonderful place to stay. Cozy, clean and just right. Great location in a calm, residential, tree-filled area that's in between two streets with lots of restaurants and little shops. It was easy to take the bus into the heart of the city as well. Ruby is a great host. When we arrived, there was a card for us and little treats. She was also quick to respond to my questions. I would definitely stay here again. Also, everything was clean and the place smelled really nice. It's a basement apartment, but it doesn't feel stuffy or closed-in at all. You can see the greenery outside. The only criticism I might possibly have: There were 4 of us (2 adults & 2 kids) and perhaps it's better suited to just two people in terms of eating arrangements if you're planning on making dinner. And there was a little bit of noise from other kids playing, but not a big deal and this is mentioned in the description anyway. These aren't really criticisms - it's just good to be aware of these points. All in all, it really was a great place to stay and, as I said, we would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Thanks again, Ruby! One thing to note is we couldn’t find a duvet cover for the pull out bed? Also, shana mentioned she had to sleep the other way around on it so her head was above her feet lol… we totally understand how hard it is to make pull outs comfortable.
We loved the stay and wish we could have stayed longer… didn’t have enough time this trip!
Thanks again!
cute little place in a beautiful neighborhood, lots to do nearby
Perfect location for dining and nightlife in the city. Short walk tomTabor park and a manageable walk to downtown too!
Ruby's place was great for my friend and I who were visiting Portland for the first time. Easy street parking and a perfect, quiet location in a nice neighborhood.
Comfortable, clean, and cute with unique and thoughtful touches

We loved the art apartment! Ruby was super welcoming by leaving a card and some treats. Everything you need here. I also really liked the art and decor. The neighborhood is quiet and beautiful. It was way too hot this week to use the sauna, but it looks lovely! I would definitely recommend this spot :)
This is a wonderful place to stay in Portland.
Wonderful space with plenty of ambiance. Very safe location. Easy street parking. Excellent communication from and with the host. Can't say enough good things :) I would definitely stay here again!

This apartment was cute!! We loved the location, the decorations and the essential oils and natural products everywhere. The apartment had everything we could’ve needed for our stay! The sofa bed and full bed were really comfortable. I would like to note that this is sort of like a basement apartment - mostly underground. Thank you for letting us stay!
We had a wonderful stay! Such a relaxing and well thought out space.
We had a great stay in this lovely apartment! The vibe was perfect!
Ruby was a gracious host and a clear and considerate communicator. Beautiful home! Wish I stayed longer. Can’t wait to come back when I visit again and stay at the Arts Apartment!
Sweet spot in amazing neighborhood. You won’t be disappointed by all the area had to offer and within walking distance. Ruby was responsive and helpful in making dining suggestions.
A lovely little stay! The apartment was cute and cozy and wonderfully situated. Ruby was responsive and flexible.

Great location with easy parking. The space is beautiful decorated with lots of original art and a well appointed kitchen.
Hope we can get back soon!
Adorable efficient space, in a truly great Portland neighborhood.
We loved being able to walk to dinner in such a great neighborhood! The apartment is comfortable and everything worked as described.
Amazing place in fabulous location!!!
Great location, comfortable accomodations. Walking distance to restaurants, bars in the Hawthorne area. Very charming area. Host was also attentive.

Ruby’s place was perfect for us. It was a great home base as we explored the SE neighborhoods in PDX. Nice amenities, comfortable bed, and private. Next time we’re in Portland, we would consider staying again.

This is a fantastic apartment! It is spotless clean, provides easy to follow directions for check in and out, and information for our stay It's nicely decorated with comfy bedding that has luxurious pillows and when it's rainy and cold, like it was during our visit, the heaters were easy to turn on and off and kept the place warm and toasty. It is a short walk to a grocery, many coffee shops and restaurants of a wide variety of offerings. I highly recommend this one!
Nice apartment. Clean and comfortable. Ruby is a excellent host.

Well stocked, cozy, comfortable basement apartment in Hawthorne neighborhood of Portland. Several eateries within walking distance. we had a car and found this a great central location to explore Portland and surrounds.
Excellent host- checks in to see if any items are needed, and goes out of her way to accommodate requests !
Just as described! Very cozy place, wonderful neighborhood with lots of restaurants within walking distance.
Wonderful stay! Super clean. Perfect location. We didn’t have a car and walked everywhere!! Ruby thought of everything you may need and more! I will absolutely stay here again!
My friends and I enjoyed our stay here. Location and ease of parking and safe neighborhood were the best parts.

this space was very cozy and artsy for sure. it was near some good restaurants and also had the biketown electric bikes to rent near by.
ruby was very generous with her records and record player as well as coffee and tea selections. would visit again !!
We enjoyed our stay, the art apartment was cozy and clean. There are good restaurants just a few blocks away, fun place to stay…

The property was decorated with lovely artworks and it had everything we needed as described.
Ruby was a wonderful host. She sorted out issues promptly and replied quickly to my questions
Ruby's place was a great value for the location by the great bustling life of Hawthorn.

The Art Apartment is well managed by the host. The art speaks to the copious details the host left us before we were to check in. The host thought of everything and let us know in advance, to make our trip as relaxed as possible!

Ruby’s place was perfect! The stay was so comfortable and in a great location. Lots of things to do nearby, and when we would come back to the airbnb it felt like home. Made our trip to Portland with our 10 month old a breeze. Thank you Ruby ❤️

Ruby's place has a lot of thoughtful amenities like a large coat rack, an air purifier, nice kitchen knives, a Brita filter, and lots of spare bedding. We found the previous folks stowed dirty dishes in the cabinet, which was disappointing given the cleaning fee charged. We did wish for a full-length mirror and an iron that didn't leak water everywhere. Despite an earnest attempt, we couldn't figure out how to work the bizarre ironing board. If you have a nice event to attend, this place might not have the basics needed to get ready.
Just fine
Fantastic spot, very cool and unique. Amazing location and great value! check in and out couldn't be simpler! thanks for everything, Ruby
Amazing place to stay!! Ruby is extremely nice & welcoming.
Relaxing back yard. A beautiful living space.
This was a great spot to stay in Portland for a few days!
Good, convenient cozy place. Record player that also has bluetooth and cd player (with cds in the drawer) was fun to listen to. Complimentary French press coffee and sparkling water were life savers

Apartment was very cute and was stocked with drinks and such, I have yet to see that in an air bnb and it was a thoughtful touch. The “hobbit” bathroom definitely lived up to its name, but luckily none of us are very tall so it was no problem hehe. Would definitely rent from her again
Great location, clean, and easy access.

An amazing experience with an excellent host - this place is everything it says it is and is in an awesome neighborhood close to bars, brunch, arcades and more. An awesome spot with a sauna & firepit and some very considerate & communicative hosts. Thanks for an amazing weekend!

Wonderful place to stay
Clean quiet and unique.

Incredible location, deeply hospital host, funky and quirky home. This place was soo perfect for a cozy Portland getaway. I felt so cared for and Ruby was available and helpful!
Highly recommend this amazing home, host, and space.
Also the sauna - magic!
great time and beautiful place! awesome neighborhood.
Great location super cute!
Loved this spot! Prime walking location, quiet spot to come back to and incredible sauna!

Cozy, with nice furnishings. Tricky to unlock the gate when we arrived at night, but we got in. At first it was nice and toasty but we were unable to adjust the heat, which ran all night, so we actually had trouble sleeping from being so hot.

Ruby is an absolutely amazing host! Both her responsiveness and the place have exceeded all expectations. The place was very clean, warm and cozy. Ruby provided clear check-in and check-out instructions and was happy to answer any questions we had during our stay.
The only sad thing is that we were so busy exploring the city that we didn't get enough time to try the sauna. It means we should come again! I highly recommend this place and Ruby as a host to anyone looking to have a fantastic experience in Portland.
Great apartment with everything one could need -- lots of fluffy towels, great linens, nicely decorated, etc. Thanks for a lovely stay!
Super cute place. Ruby is a wonderful host with beautiful amenities and the bed was soooo comfortable. Would very much recommend

A great please to stay! The location was perfect!
I do say that the bathroom ceiling is really low. If you’re above 5’6, you might hit your head.
But other than that. It’s a awesome place to stay
Perfect place for a Portland getaway!

PERFECT! PERFECT! PERFECT!
This is how an AirBnB experience should be.
It was just a short stop for us as we were only there for about 12 hours. With a short stay, there's no time for drama, etc. Couldn't have asked for a better stay.
Next time, I might try the unit that's detached from the house as that place looked cool also.
Thanks Ruby.
Cheers,
Paul
Super cute place. Felt very homey
Super cool and unique place to stay that felt safe and also entirely Portland. I loved it :)

Ruby's Art Apartment was an absolute delight! We would stay here again in an instant. Ruby was on top of communication, which made checking in a breeze. They had the space already lit and warmed for us when we arrived. The apartment has a wonderful and warm atmosphere. Very clean and inviting. Perfect place to recharge. We highly recommend!
Ruby’s place was extremely welcoming and homey. Great neighborhood and a really beautiful and artistic space. Ruby did a great job communicating and making us feel at home. Would recommend!
Easy to check in/out. Cozy place on a quiet safe street!

Ruby’s place was ideal for our stay in Portland. We had a number of plans for dinners etc. around town and found ourselves shelving plans to walk around the neighborhood- everything was so close! If you’re looking to stay in the Southeast area, this is in the perfect location between major corridors. Ruby put attention into the smaller details of her home that made the stay comfortable- from wonderful doTerra sample offerings in the shower to having coffee for us during the stay to the apartment decor feeling warm and inviting. The apartment is cozy, bed is super comfortable, and she has really all the amenities you’d need to relax and have a functional home base for your excursions in the city. Thanks Ruby!
cute basement apartment, as advertised, fast communication, friendly and accommidating host. Stairs to get into apartment a little steep but there is a strong hand hold.
Cute little basement home. Close to shops and food near by which we absolutely loved.

quaint and quiet, artsy and eclectic. this is a true gem!
and it's close to all kinds of great eateries and mass transit in a lovely residential area.
a perfect pick
Charming place and yard! Near everything and everyone we came to see in Portland. Would go back!

This apartment was in a great location for walking to local coffee shops, etc. Clean and cozy. *HEADS UP- Anyone 6’0” or taller, there are many spots in the ceiling that are low and you will have to hunch over often. I somehow missed this and my husband hit his head a few times.*

Cozy lovely basement space that was very clean and comfortable. Great location to walk to restaurants and coffee shops nearby. Adequate amenities. Can hear people walking upstairs but it didn’t bother us. Would stay here again.
It wasawesome.
Perfect location and incredibly comfy bed!

Cute place in a nice location in Hawthorne. Bathroom ceiling is a little low. Host gives a heads up about it, but it still won’t be the most comfortable place to use the facilities if you’re over 6 foot. Otherwise great place to stay.

We loved this little Airbnb! The space was very clean and secure. It’s so close to restaurants and night life without being right downtown and we found the most delicious dinner at Farmhouse Thai Kitchen (highly recommend!!). Ruby was extremely communicative and took care to make sure we had everything we needed.

I loved staying here! The apartment is so unique and fun, the garden outside was beautiful, and it’s conveniently located. Ruby was also very responsive and friendly. I would definitely stay here again.
If you have small children I do not recommend this place because they have a trampoline without a net and it looks unsafe
Such a wonderful stay. I had no issues and enjoyed everything about it. Ruby was an excellent host with great communication. The stay was everything plus more that we could expect.

Stayed just for the night on my way through Portland, was a great little spot! Perfect location, quiet neighborhood and cozy basement apartment. Seamless communication. Everything I needed for my short stay. Would stay again!

This space was so cozy! Felt just like home. Ruby was communicative and sweet.
I love the location and walking distance from plenty of shops and restaurants. This neighborhood is adorable as well!

Although I never met Ruby her hospitality came through with little things like very fast communication and a very well stocked kitchen. We had everything we needed. And we loved their garden and getting to sit in the back yard. one evening when we were walking out the back gate a passerby even complemented us on the beautiful garden! The location is also very convenient to stores and restaurants on Hawthorne.
Perfect spot!
The apartment was as advertised, clean, and close to plenty of fun things to do. I would recommend it!
Clean, cozy and comfortable. Great for a couple. Very nice residential area, walking distance to shops and restaurants.
I can only say the very best things about Ruby's place, including about Ruby herself!.....buuuut I'm not gonna because if she gets any more popular, WE'LL never get back in there! :-)
Cozy little apartment located with walking distance of great restaurants and shops.
Great place, wish we could stay there longer than a night. Artful decor and timely communication. Within walking distance to lots of restaurants. Definite recommend.

Loved my stay at this space. It was so easy, quiet, clean, and in a great location. It was the perfect Portland neighborhood to come back to after a day of exploring and visiting friends. I was really impressed with the way the space didn’t feel too small or even that it was really in a basement. Highly recommend!
Unit had everything we needed for our stay and great location. Bed very comfortable. Ruby was very responsive to messages and enjoyed meeting her.

A cute apartment full of unique art in a cute and friendly part of Portland. We have no complaints about the amenities or features of the apartment. super cozy!
Easy access to the bars on Division and the great shopping on Hawthorne. The neighborhood is pretty quiet at night which can be a good or bad thing depending on what you're looking for. Plan to have dinner early. Also take advantage of the numerous buses and the BikeTown bike share.
It was an amazing stay! Ruby kept the apartment nice and cool! Highly recommend staying at her place if you need a place to stay in Portland.
Sweet pad for a small group with excellent service! Host is very welcoming and location is fantastic :-)
Ruby is a great host and the apartment is very cozy and well designed. Easy (free) street parking. It was nice to sit outside in the backyard in the evenings. Would stay here again.
Great space, great location!

I really liked staying here—the location is perfect. The apartment is cozy, well appointed, and sparkling clean. My partner and I stayed, and it is perfect for two people (who know each other well). The ceilings are a bit low, but they are exactly as described in the listing. The bathroom might be difficult to navigate if you are taller than 5’10”.

This is a true gem! The studio is beautiful, artistic, and spacious, and the hosts were highly responsive and helpful. The queen bed was possibly the most comfortable bed I've experienced at an AirBnB; the kitchen and bath were both thoughtfully appointed; and the outdoor sitting area was adorable. The location is fabulous -- the house is tucked in a gorgeous neighborhood full of charming homes and gardens, and it's just a few blocks from great restaurants and cafes. This was the perfect spot for two adults. My only suggestion to the hosts would be the possibility of adding a curtain that could close off the bedroom area if needed, which would make the space even more suitable for kids and night owls. :-) We absolutely hope to stay here again! Thank you!
Great little space! Super clean and tucked away!
Nice location and nice place. Very spacious.
The apartment was clean and cozy. Ruby had plenty of fans out for those warmer days. Would stay here again!
Great location with fantastic amenities. Perfect for a short trip.
This was the most charming, garden neighborhood! We really loved the personal touches throughout the space!The host even had a few essentials stocked in the fridge!

This place is super cozy and all of the little amazing touches that Ruby added made it that much better. There was a temperature controlled kettle & tea to enjoy it with! There was a diffuser and so many different oils to choose from. Everything you could possibly need in the kitchen. We also got to use the sauna which was very easy to use!
Listing is just as described. Private space, comfortable bed, and very clean. We appreciated the thoughtful touches. Thanks for hosting us!
This was the perfect stay for the last day of our PNW trip. Super comfortable bed, probably the best sleep we had the entire week!
Second visit. Just as great as before. Thank you!
Nice place. Well situated. Great location.

Lance & Nicole's space was a treat. It is always a pleasure to find a spot that is pretty much EXACTLY what you are looking for! We were attending a show at Moda Center and just wanted a nice place that was pretty close, not very spendy, and comfortable for a good nights rest.
This is that spot. I know the neighborhood somewhat so I knew it was a good area to stay. Tons to do around. Etc.
For just staying very briefly... we were still welcomed with nice little touches like snacks and very clear instructions to a very nice little VERY clean space. Bathroom was nice and clean and they had dishes and microwave and fridge for any meals you packed or possibly leftovers from great food near by.
Communication was flawless and street parking was actually super easy and not overcrowded.
When we plan another trip down to the area we hope this space is available as we really enjoyed the short time we were there.
Cheers Lance & Nicole! Thanks for having us : )
Great little spot in north Portland!!
Great walking neighborhood, quiet and safe and lot of great food right walking distance!
Comfortable stay! Very communicative hosts.

Super easy access for coming and going. Plenty of parking on both sides of the street. Very clear and easy instructions.
Clean and comfortable. Looks exactly like the photos. I would stay here again in a heart beat.

I loved staying here! The place was so clean, so easy to get in and out of with the garage door, and so comfortable. The bed and bedding were lux, and I really appreciated the earplugs and white noise machine as a sound sensitive person. There was some afternoon drumming upstairs (someone must be a musician) but it only happened from maybe 2:30-5:30pm, not during quiet hours. They absolutely said in the description that there would be some daytime noise, so it was not an issue. The location was PRIME, I loved walking to the restaurants on Alberta and Killingsworth nearby. And the street parking was not an issue at all. They even left me two cookies and a bag of microwave popcorn 🥹 A lovely stay and I will be back!

Lance and Nicole have really gone above and beyond and set a new standard for how incredible an Airbnb can be! You can feel the love and consideration that has gone into every single detail. I love the Alberta Arts District and hope we will be able to stay here again next time we are in town.
Nice, clean, private space. Hosts were helpful with questions. Would stay again!
The hostesses with the mostest. Lance and Nicole are the best! You won’t regret your stay here.
Great location, super walkable. Appreciate being able to use the pack and play for our little one. Bed was so comfy! Loved all the little amenities and touches to make our stay comfortable.
It was a great stay - the rooms were comfortable and clean, the neighborhood was great, and Lance and Nicole were very friendly!

We couldn’t have been happier with our stay! Lance and Nicole have done such a great job making the space comfortable and clean. They thought of all the little details that we might need. The location was perfect for going to restaurants, exploring the city, and relaxing. 10/10!!
Staying here was the perfect spot for my PDX visit. Apartment was as advertised. Big bed and full bathroom. Would stay here again.
Perfect cozy place in a great location!

Lance and Nicole’s place was perfect for our one night stay in Portland. Their home is well located and walkable to many shops and restaurants in the Alberta neighborhood. I appreciated the personal touches they provided like the snacks and local beer in the fridge. They were super friendly and communicative and were flexible on accommodating a last minute request. Highly recommend this place!
It’s a nice place to stay, nice decoration and warm welcome
Great place to stay in Portland :) super clean, has everything you need - even extra snacks which was so amazing! Would definitely come back.
Great place!

Pros: Clean and affordable. I have lived in Portland before and would say this neighborhood is extremely safe and fairly central to getting around. Street parking was easy each day. Entering through the garage is easy and there are multiple door locks once you are in the bedroom.
Cons: I read and understood in the listing that they have two young children however that is understating the noise level. I heard footsteps, conversations, and the sound of kids playing throughout the late afternoon and evening on my first day and in the morning and later evening of my second day. The bed does not have a headboard to sit up against and hard dining chairs are the only other place to sit. The listing photos are very bright but in reality the space is not well lit and there is only one small window above the bed with a view of a fence.
Overall a decent Airbnb option for a 1-2 night stay.

Lance and Nicole's place was welcoming and peaceful- down to the cookies and popcorn. Great neighborhood with lots of restaurants within walking distance, but I was happy to eat in because I didn't want to leave. Bed was super comfortable. Highly recommended! I hope their place is available the next time I'm back in Portland.
Wonderful and cozy! I chose this area because my friend was coming late from the airport and we had lots to do in the morning. So glad we chose this stay 🥰

This Airbnb was perfect for my boyfriend and I’s one night spent in Portland. It was adorable, and the hosts left cookies and two local beers:) it was the perfect way to end a long day of traveling. Thank you for the personal touches!
Great location! Had everything we needed, plus really appreciated the robes, cookies, beer, and snacks. Highly recommend staying here!
This is a hidden gem,10 minutes from downtown. Beautiful.

What a perfect location! Easy to walk to so many great shops and restaurants, and on a beautiful quiet street. The place was a bit smaller and darker than expected from the listing (it’s a basement with entry thru the garage, and only one window) but had great decor, a comfy bed, and lots of extra touches like snacks and a choice of pillows.
Just what we had hoped for!
Very clean and comfortable. Had everything we needed and more. I highly recommend :)
Great neighborhood. Suite was cute, with everything you needed. Would definitely stay again. Thanks!

Super cute place! We stayed here for a week and worked remotely, and everything was great. Several thoughtful touches that made us feel right at home. Strong internet, a place to put our bikes in the garage, and long table that we could both work from, and walkable to lots of NE restaurants.
Clean and quiet and great location.
Clean and comfortable! They were very responsive and lent me a phone charger :)
This was a great deal and the hosts were very accommodating. They left us a couple of cookies, which I thought was very sweet. The space was perfect for the price.
Great neighborhood and close to airport. Home is comfortable and convenient! Was a wonderful stay.
Nice and a cozy place in a good neighborhood. Clean rooms and bedding.

Great place. The only thing which was well described is that it does get warm in there and one can hear furnace but they supply ear buds and a noise machine to block out the noise. Greatly appreciated !
Our stay and Lance and Nicole's was just as described and perfect for what we needed for the night. Bed and pillows were comfortable.

We had a wonderful stay! They made such great use of the space they have. Very welcoming and beautiful place.
It’s always a guess if the bed is going to be comfortable. This bed is absolutely as comfortable as they come! Loved it!
The hosts are a young, lively and playful family. Thank you for having your wonderful place available on Airbnb!

I had a morning flight from PDX and needed a place to stay the night before. I had a rainy dark 2 hour ride from home to get to their place. There was parking on the street as promised; it is easy to follow the instructions for how to get inside. The kitchen area has lots of welcoming touches like tea bags (caffeine and herbal). Everything (kitchen, bedroom, bathroom) was spotless. The bed (queen? king?) was extremely comfortable. There is a bathtub in the small bathroom, which had hot water. I love being able to have a bath when I'm travelling. I noticed the address is a short walk from New Seasons Market Concordia. The space was great for an overnight. It is fairly compact for a longer stay and might be cramped for two travellers. I feel lucky I found it when I needed it. It is a welcome refuge.

I was in town for a work trip and Lance and Nicole's place was perfect! I was very comfortable and really appreciated the thoughtful accommodations, including heat vent covers, ear plugs, and pillow options. The home is close enough to Alberta that you can walk to anything you want but still on a quiet street with plenty of parking. I will definitely be booking their place for future trips.
Another great stay at Lance and Nicole’s place. Clean, quiet and cozy spot, and walkable to lots of restaurants and bars. We’ll definitely be staying here again.
The stay as amazing. Perfect space for our trip. Very accommodating, clean and had personal touches. We will definitely look to stay here again!
Perfect for me staying alone. I felt safe and not bothered by anyone

Gonna preface this review by saying my friend and I flew into Portland towards the tail end of the ice storm: frozen trees, felled power lines, icy roads/sidewalks, the whole unfortunate kit and caboodle. Despite all this, Lance and Nicole made sure the suite was clean, warm, and ready. They even accommodated an earlier check-in, allowing us to dodge even more freezing rain later that day. Location itself was ideal and central to everything we did, and the surrounding roads were so heavily trafficked we had minimal slush to worry about driving on. We could hear their family above, but it didn't bother us, and they provided ear plugs just in case. Also, the bed was probably the most comfortable I've slept on in my life. I'm rambling now. They exceeded expectations, especially given the circumstances! HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

The home was comfortable and clean, offering a cozy and well-decorated setup to get some rest for the one night I was there. Instructions to enter the property were clear, and I appreciated that I had my own dedicated entrance. I would love to stay again if I had the chance!
Very lovely place very clean i felt right at homeb

Great stay! The place was easy to find and they had detailed instructions that made our self check-in a breeze. Everything inside was clean and well organized, while remaining a cozy space for our family, during our one night stay. They had a book of recommendations for restaurants nearby, we were able to enjoy a nice walk to one for dinner! Thankful we found this spot, last minute for us, and thank you to Lance and Nicole for providing a safe space for our family!

The place is in a great location, super walkable to Alberta Street, which has great restaurants and locally owned shops. There are bikes to rent nearby as well.
The bed is SOOOOOOO comfortable! The sheets and blanket were super soft and cozy. The bathroom was very clean and had everything I needed. I even took a bath on a cold day.
Check in was easy, the directions were well thought out, and I felt I had my own private space.
Loved it!
Clean and cozy, we felt right at home. The welcome cookies were a nice and homey touch. would definitely stay again!
Thank for returning my retainer beautiful place b d was perfect
What a cute, cozy, and spotlessly clean space! Lots of little touches, like homemade cookies and snacks, to make us feel right at home. Super comfy bed and pillows.

Great space, great stay! Bed was very comfortable, along with pillows and linens. Perfect amenities, too! Always thankful when hosts leave fans as my boyfriend runs hot. Very walkable. Would stay here again!
Cozy space with a comfy bed. Very clean. Loved playing a few LPs on the record player to wind down at night. Easy parking. Thanks for a great stay!
Awesome place, great price, hard to beat!

I can’t recommend Nicole & Lance’s place highly enough! Everything is as described; amenities are plentiful, the bed is comfy (and big!), and everything has been very well-thought out. Major highlights: The private entrance (yes, it’s actually the garage door via the nicest, cleanest garage I’ve ever seen), the hang-out space/kitchenette (with homemade cookies!!), and the private bathroom. If you are looking for a well-appointed, comfortable, tidy place to stay for one night or one week to explore Portland, you couldn’t do better. We were there for only one night to catch a plane back home, but it was a restful, peaceful night in a safe neighborhood in a beautiful part of Portland. We would definitely stay again!
Great little place. They really go above and beyond with the details! Would love to be back.
It was a lovely experience.
I had an amazing week-long stay at Lance and Nicole's place. It is obvious that they pay attention to even the smallest details. I especially loved the record player!
Great location and great unit. All the details are thought out. Highly recommended!

Lance & Nicole’s place was as advertised, cozy, clean and comfortable. Everything was clearly labeled and detailed instructions provided. We really enjoyed the higher touches, like our names on the board, welcome cookies, and a binder full of reccommendations!

Really loved all the special touches of your place- thank you! Lots of nice little surprises - a nice little kitchen space with a great selection of snacks, which were a nice surprise:) I loved the little sitting area and how you’ve decorated! Thanks for the Portland share as well (needed that since not at all from around here)!
Appreciate all you’ve put into your place!

We enjoyed our one night stay at Lance and Nicole's. A short walk to the main street in Alberta Arts district. The space was compact and comfortable. The only downside was I could not control the thermostat. Having said that my husband and I slept well and woke up refreshed.

Super great place! I loved the neighborhood as well as the recommendations they left for places to eat and drink. It was super affordable and clean. The bed was super comfortable as well. I loved all their recommendations as well as the cookies they left! We felt very at home.
loved Lance and Nicole’s place, it was clean and quaint! they were super accommodating of early check in and left us cookies!
I stayed here one night and it was perfect for what I was looking for. It's fairly close to the airport and a very clean & updated space. Lance and Nicole were quick to respond & very friendly!

It was a lovely place to stay!! We really enjoyed it and had a great time just relaxing. Super clean and cozy. If you’re young and looking to party this might not be the place for you, but it’s great just for a restful weekend.

Lance and Nicole’s place was exactly as described and just perfect for my visit. It was easy to find and had everything I could need or want. I enjoyed the location as it was a great neighborhood to run in and close to restaurants and coffee shops. I would definitely stay here again.
the room is perfect and they are very good hosts. Thank you very much for everything.

I had a great stay here. I stayed for three days, and the place is perfect for a short term stay, especially if you plan to eat out or get delivery.
Hosts provided a flexible check-in which I was beyond grateful for as I was feeling under the weather. Easy check-in. Always responsive hosts.
Location is perfect for walking to all the restaurants and bars on Killingsworth. Just a short walk to my favorite cocktail bar in Portland: Expatriate!
The bed and pillows are amazinggg!! I can’t recommend enough… the best bed and pillows I’ve ever had at an Airbnb. Nice furniture in the living area also. Dining area is well stocked with refrigerator and utensils that you would need. Good WiFi. I never had an issue with upstairs noise, but it’s thoughtful that the hosts provided a white noise machine in the room!

Lance and Nicole’s place was 10/10! The instructions to get inside were super easy, everything is nicely labeled, in place and organized. There was popcorn, cookies, water and beer (not sure if that was host or left but great either way!). The bed was SO COMFORTABLE. It was quiet the entire time except the last night we could hear some little kiddos upstairs but it wasn’t too loud and didn’t go too late. It’s not a LOT of room but it was perfect for us because we just needed a place to sleep and get ready. Location was great, I was able to walk 5 minutes and grab some ramen one night with ease. They were super responsive when I had questions, and I’d honestly recommend this cute little spot to anyone who needs a place in Portland.

Met the Nicole outside as we both pulled up at the same time making sure we were parked correctly & entered the airbnb how we were supposed to and she was super nice! The place is easy to enter and is downstairs from they’re main living. It is clean, very cute & private/secluded. A special touch of our names on a peg board welcoming us along w/ cookies & drinks which was a nice gesture & greatly appreciated!

Hurry and book Lance and Nicole's Airbnb, you will not regret it!
Best bed I have every slept in and they have thought of every last detail for a great stay!
Exceeded my expectations!
In one of the best neighborhoods in Portland, can walk to amazing restaurants and New Seasons grocery store right down the street!
Great place and location!

Great place , great price, great location (just a mile from our daughters home). So clean and comfortable! Set out yummy cookies, had coffee, tea, filtered water. Just a great place will definitely stay again!!!
Perfect little getaway for a short stay. The place was clean and there was fresh cookies waiting for us that were delicious! Lance was very quick and responsive responsive as well.

Loved staying at this cozy place near Alberta Street! I only stayed for one night during a work trip, but it had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. Lance and Nicole were so helpful when I asked about restaurant recommendations, and so many things in the rental were labeled with helpful instructions. For example: their heating/AC is all connected on one thermostat, so the unit doesn't have internal temperature controls. But they were sure to give helpful tips and make me aware of what I could do to stay warm/cool as needed. I would happily stay here again. Thanks, Lance and Nicole!
place is small but we only needed it for sleep after a late flight. perfect for one person or two who don't need a kitchen. close to the airport and easy to get everywhere downtown.

from start to finish this⁸ host pulled out all the stops. I really appreciated the early drop off service and also the late pick up on my check out day. apartment looked just like the photos and was very clean. I would recommend staying with Lance and Nicole if in town and want to explore parts of Portland. Great location and walkable safe neighborhoods and dining spots nearby to enjoy. public transportation was easy to navigate as well as many lines within walking distance.
Great stay for what we were doing in Portland. Location was great for everything we wanted to do. Space was beautiful and clean. Very welcoming.

What a nice place to stay. I loved the fact that there was a welcome cookie and treats when I arrived, and a ‘welcome’ sign on the wall. It really made me feel at home staying here. It seemed to be a super nice neighborhood but I didn’t really get a chance to check it out as my flight was delayed and I didn’t arrive til very late. Still, communication with the host was simple and they were very kind and welcoming. Would love to stay again.

Very clean! Close to good restaurants and shops on Alberta street, and easy to find street parking. The unit is long, but had everything I needed for the stay (no stovetop, but lots of food options nearby). Overall a very pleasant and comfortable stay.
This was one of the best Airbnb’s we’ve stayed. Very comfortable, clean and full of nice surprises. The neighborhood was great and we had a great dinner at Bar Cala. Highly recommend!

Clean and exactly as described. Walking distance to Alberta Arts district for restaurants, stores and pharmacy nearby. Close proximity to PDX for easy commute.
Bed was comfy and sheets amazing. As informed we heard tiny footsteps above but not at all bothersome and they settled early and were respectful of noise. Nice kitchenette

A lovely well-kept and trendy space to spend the night. The Alberta Arts District seems to have much to see and places to eat. There's no dedicated kitchen, but a kitchenette puts it on par with hotel rooms. The place felt clean and upscale. Personal touches and some complimentary snacks made this place a winner.
Had an amazing stay, bed was super comfortable and the whole space was super cozy and nice. Would definitely stay here again.

Extremely cozy bed and good size sleeping area disconnected from a cute little nook for getting your work done. The two spaces are separated by a door so that you don’t bother your partner.
Bathroom was beautiful!
This place was in a great location! My husband and I walked throughout the neighborhood very late at night without issues. The bar scene on Alberta Ave was just what we were looking for!
The entry to the space is through the garage. While a bit off putting at first (we didn’t want to make so much noise with the door!) it was actually extremely cozy and great. Super duper insulated. We were very warm all night. I can see this being a nice stay during the winter as well!

this was a perfect place for a couple nights in Portland. extremely clean and walkable to fun neighborhood restaurants, coffee places and bars. they had many personal touches like bathrobes and fresh baked cookies. you are definitely staying below a family and can hear happy little feet running in the home above you, but this didn't matter to us. would recommend!
Great stay within walking distance to many restaurants and cafes. Definitely recommend!!

Great stay for us. Lance and Nicole were very accommodating, hospitable, and spot on with communicating on all fronts. Extremely cozy king sized bed.
Thanks again,
Great spot, comfy bed, and yummy cookies!!! 😁
Very cute place, great location, and so many thoughtful touches. Would stay again!
Seamless check in and out. The space was clean and cozy, perfect after a long day of travel. Would recommend to anybody!
Great place to stay. Clean and comfortable. Convenient, walkable location
Very nice and clean space, walking distance to Alberta for coffee. King bed is extremely comfortable!

The neighborhood we wanted to be in. Very clean. Bed was comfortable. WIFI was strong. Served our purpose. If it were a multi-day stay and we needed to be in the unit for extended periods of time, it would have been a little small.
Clean place and comfy bed. Perfect for a stay close to PDX and super cool neighborhood eateries and shops within a few block walk. Recommended
Great super walkable space. On a quiet street within a couple blocks from all the action. Place was clean and had some nice personal and thoughtful choices.

Had a great time! Perfect location. All of our (great) meals were in walking distance! It’s a small unit, but we only used it for sleeping. And it’s got the all too rare king sized bed! Definitely recommend!

Couldn’t have asked for a more perfect stay. Fantastic location near so many restaurants and shops. Easy street parking and cute neighborhood to wander. They were quick to respond to questions and so appreciated being able to drop our bags early so not in our car. The space as spotless and so cute! Everything we needed and more plus little touches like cookies and drinks that greeted us upping arrival. Comfy bed and super soft sheets too. Wish we had more than one night! Highly recommend. Loved our meals at Tin Shed and Wilder!
Great👍👍

It was our first time visiting Oregon and we had hopped around to 3 different Airbnb locations throughout our vacation. This is not the biggest Airbnb but it was by far our favorite. The place was nice and cozy and we really appreciated the clear effort Lance and Nicole put in to make us feel welcome and comfortable. From the cookies and beer waiting for us when we arrived to the quick response when we asked for their pack n play for our baby. For me, it’s the little things that count, and we really appreciated the hospitality. Thank you!
Enjoyed being able to walk to breakfast through the lovely neighborhood
Lance & Nicole’s place was perfect for our Portland getaway. Quiet & peaceful!
Great place to stay in the Alberta area. Easy check in and great communication. Also amazing cookies left for us at check in! We would love to stay here again!

Had a wonderful time at Lance and Nicole’s! They had everything I needed and some extra nice touches like beverages and snacks and records.
A lot of restaurants/bars within 5-10 minute walk (Alberta neighborhood) and parking was easy to find if you wanted to drive.
As others have mentioned, the family lives directly above the space but they were respectful of quiet hours and provided earplugs.
Thanks for a great stay!

Lance and Nicole’s place was lovely! Private entry, clean, comfy, and hospitable. No issues with street parking right in front and easy private entry access. The cookies, beers, and water in the fridge were a nice touch. Super responsive hosts, a great PDX option.

Lovely, brief stay. Quiet and thoughtfully appointed with everything I needed, really appreciated the signage explaining the little things around the place! Put me in just the part of town I wanted to be in at a great price, one of my fave parts of PDX. Would love to stay again!

Great little place. Everything is new and clean. Detached bathroom even smells new. Kinda off the grid. Wi-fi came in clutch because I didn't have service for about a 30 min radius - know where you are going! Crickets lulled me to sleep. The little patio was great for enjoying nature. It was almost 100 degrees when i was there, so they let me know before my arrival to make sure I knew what was up. I chose a few detours until the evening cool off. They had left a window fan on for me, and a 2nd larger one was ready in case I needed it, which I did. On my way out, I spent 10 minutes making sure my car I was ready to continue on my trip - they noticed and made sure I was good to go. Only thing to note is the gravel street and kinda steep kinda uneven driveway might be kinda scary to city folk. Great stay if I'm near that sparsely populated area. Totally worth it.
Great, short stay in Portland on our way to the Oregon coast. This place is perfectly located by Alberta Street and it was an easy walk to everything, even with a toddler.

The perfect find for our last night in Portland. Super close drive to the airport, restaurants, and Portlands beautiful parks. The neighborhood felt very safe (night and day). Though we were a tad disappointed to find out the bicycles mentioned in the listing were no longer available for use, the great spot, great communication from the hosts, and extra little touches MORE than made up for it! We heard from our hosts right away and they were very flexible about a slightly earlier check-in. All the little details are planned out to make your stay as enjoyable as possible (freshly baked cookies and a personalized welcome sign were such nice, unexpected touches!). Top it all off with a super comfy king size bed! Would definitely recommend a stay here.
Lance and Nicole’s place is very comfortable and close to the airport. Though we didn’t stay long, it was just what we needed.

Lance&Nicole's place is very cozy. Feels right at home with private space. We were out and about so didn't have to deal with upstairs noise much. - We were careful to observe the instructions for using the composting(?) toilet, but you can't avoid the smell getting stronger in a space where waste matter collects in a bag. I'd suggest this place for shorter stays.
- My bad, but I didn't notice in the photos that the curtains are semi-transparent and there aren't blinds. How you feel about that depends on how public or private a person you are. I'm more private so I just want to call it out for others who miss this detail.

We have already shared this listing with three different couples who want to stay here after seeing our pictures. The location was beautiful and convenient.
