The stairs are no joke in the middle of the night and the path down to the river is a little steep; I would recommend wearing grippy shoes for both. But overall it was a wonderful stay. We hope to do it again someday. Thanks!
What an incredible gem! We loved our stay here and can’t wait to come back.

We loved your cabin. Thanks for being to responsive. Cabin has beautiful and the location was perfect and private. We felt connected with nature while enjoying great amenities. Don’t hesitate to book, this is a great spot.
Beautiful place in a beautiful location.

Love Love and Love the vibes of the house and surrounding. It’s perfect for getaway trips. The house by itself was so cozy and comfortable. A lot of chill hangout spots. Have the nice clear river right next to you and the hot tub with the nice view. We would save this location and save it in favorite just in case we would love some time off from busy day again. There is a waterfall and lake that we enjoy nearby too. I can tell that the host was very caring and loving for people to enjoy the time here.

Mariann decorated the entire place with attention to the smallest details!
It was very homey and comfortable. She had coffee, creamer and sugar, lots of different items, if you want to cook your own meals, and even provided a bottle of wine! There was plenty of seating, cushions, tables, etc, inside and outside too. There were even floatation devices for the water. The shower was so cute!
The home was beautiful, quiet and peaceful and the scenery was stunning. If you haven't been here, do yourself a favor and book it! I can't wait to go back.

Very peaceful cabin. A little hard to find from the street. If you have GPS then it's not a problem. No cell signal whatsoever, but they had wifi available. We enjoyed playing in the river especially since it was extra hot during our stay, and the hot tub was a nice bonus. As the description says, very steep stairs to the rooms but we managed. Kitchen was well stocked and had everything we needed. Plenty of games to keep the kids occupied as well. It's a cabin nestled in the woods, so lots of bugs but we expected that. Just wanted others to be aware.

If we could give this place 10 stars we would! We absolutely loved it and will be back. We relaxed in the hot tub, swam in the river with our two dogs, and read peacefully on the wrap around deck. Multon Falls Regional Park is within 10 minutes from the house and is a breathtaking place to hike. All around we had a wonderful stay.
Very satisfied with this property.
We had a great time! Beautiful place with a lot to do and a great host! I would definitely recommend this cabin by the river to anyone looking for a peaceful/cozy getaway!

Easy to find, check in was a breeze. Immaculately cleaned, well stocked kitchen and bathroom. Location was everything we were looking for, felt remote and private but town was an easy drive away. Based on reviews I was a little worried about the stairs leading up to the bedrooms, but they were exactly as described and pictured in the listing.. if you have mobility issues or small children, this isn’t the property for you.
We had a wonderful time as a family and definitely plan on coming back next summer!
We had such a relaxing and wonderful weekend. What a gem! We’d love to come see it in the winter or fall as well.

If we could give a 6 star, we would. What a fantastic cabin with walk around decks. The lower deck with the hot tub a real gem. Down by the river, the lounge chairs were terrific. It is the kind of cabin you wished your family had. It was so cozy on the inside, the kitchen was loaded. The decorations were really fun. The upstairs bedrooms were charming. The ladder to get to them was a climb, but worth it. Our dog loved swimming in the river. We would do it again in a heartbeat.
A beautiful A frame cottage surrounded by natural and peaceful river is exactly what a relaxing weekend needed.
Gorgeous location. The beach area is absolutely perfect for hot summer days. The view is amazing. A bald eagle flew past the house following the river. We had an amazing time.
Just perfect. Peaceful, gorgeous setting, private.

I enjoyed our stay at the river cottage.
It was a beautiful and peaceful scenery. 5 stars all around.
Loved our stay!
This place was the best! So beautiful and peaceful. The home is so perfectly curated, there wasn’t nothing we needed that wasn’t easily available! We wish we could have stayed longer!!
If you enjoy a beautiful peaceful getaway, look no further!

We absolutely loved our stay at The River Cottage. The home was beautiful, peaceful, very well appointed and we enjoyed every minute we were there. Yes, the stairs are steep, but that’s part of the charm of this adorable A frame home. Just go. You’ll love it!

We enjoyed our time outside here. Inside, not as much.
Pros: The location is gorgeous. We loved the private beach and the amenities like the canoe, grill, and fire pit. Our kids enjoyed the games provided both indoors and out. The kitchen was well equipped and included quality coffee. Beds were comfortable. Linens were quality and clean.
Cons: It felt really cluttered to us and in need of a deep cleaning. Lots of dust, mildew in the shower, and the fridge had clearly not been wiped out since the last guest. The hot tub was pretty dirty too. The countertops had lots of stuff on them which made it difficult to do much food prep in the kitchen. If you are allergic to dogs or bothered by dog hair, this is not the place for you. The dog hair was everywhere. The stairs were fine for our bigger kids but scary with our two year old. Not only are they steep, there is not much of a landing at the top of the stairs when you step out of either bedroom.
Great spot right on the river with a hot tub! Very relaxing.

Had things like coffee and candies, offered yo reach out if we needed anything. The wifi crapped out on us once and we unplugged it for a minute or two and it cane back. She was friendly and quick to respond. Let us check in an hour early which was greatly appreciated. Neat little area and i would own this place if i could afford it as a getaway. Many little things were thought of and provided. Was a lot of fun.
Third time staying here, planning for another next year. Such a peaceful place

My stay at Mariann’s River Cottage was everything I wanted!! It was so peaceful and the scenery was picturesque. The cottage itself was comfy, well equipped and stayed nice and cool. A morning coffee in the hanging chair off the back deck is a must!

We had a wonderfully relaxing stay, everything was perfect! River cottage has everything you need and more for a comfortable stay. Host is very friendly and responsive. The cottage is just as pictured. Hot tub was very clean and nice after hiking all day! There is so much outdoor space to enjoy the surroundings. We can’t wait to come back again!
Fantastic location. The stairs are a little treacherous but would absolutely stay again.
My husband and I had a relaxing weekend with our 2 dogs. This cabin is a gem! The pictures don’t do it justice. Looking forward to rebooking again
Very easy check-in, perfect location with no visible neighbors, and a really comfortable atmosphere.
Best air bnb I have ever stayed in. We had such a great time. The hospitality Mariann displayed is unmatched. I’d recommend to anyone at anytime.
Really homey place that is well laid out. Loved all the games and the hot tub. Would be fun to do a campfire but it was too wet out while there. River is beautiful. Dogs were very comfy too.

This place matched the photos and more. Beautiful location directly on the river. The house is cute and tiny. And the hosts have made it so homey, with games and things everywhere to help entertain. The hosts gave us a bottle of wine and hid Easter eggs, as we were staying over Easter weekend. Overall, the hosts went above and beyond and the location and home are truly amazing. Worth it.
Lovely riverfront property! Private, quiet & relaxing.

Had an amazingly relaxing weekend here. The house is close to the road but you barely notice it. It rained all weekend but that only made the whole experience cozier. Sitting in the hot tub and looking at the river was incredible. Didn’t want to leave!

Mariann’s river cabin is the the quintessential get away experience. Private and peaceful. So many thoughtful additions and details organized to enhance and luxuriate your stay. One of the most stocked and generously supplied kitchens I’ve ever experienced. The cabin is full of charm and comfort nestled just far enough from ‘civilization’ to offer a remote experience without complete isolation.
Mariann was a responsive and helpful host and gave wonderful recommendations and insight to local attractions and food options.
The whole experience was an absolute dream. Thank you, we will be back!!!

This place is an absolute dream. My boyfriend and I wanted to be surrounded by trees and beautiful nature for our anniversary and this place exceeded our expectations!
The pictures do not do it justice!
This cottage is the perfect place to disconnect from the outside world (quite literally because there is no service) and really just enjoy your time with loved ones and relax.
We got a little rain, snow, and sunshine. We had everything we needed.
Oh! And another huge plus….the beds were SO COMFORTABLE! You won’t regret staying at the river cottage, so if you’re on the fence…this is me telling you to do it! :)
Mariann was always quick to respond and was very accommodating! We can’t wait to come back ! :)
Such an awesome place to stay. Will be coming back!!
We loved our time at Mariann's cottage. The home was cozy, peaceful, and had all of the things we needed for a quiet weekend away. Would book again!
This is a wonderful cabin. We have a family of five and we had a terrific visit to this beautiful spot on the river. We would love to come back!

This was our second stay at the River Cottage, and it was just as nice, if not better, than the first! It's very welcoming, cozy, and quiet. Mariann is very quick with responses, and is always pleasant to chat with. We love the River Cottage and plan to keep coming back each year! If you're looking for a quiet, peaceful, beautiful place to kick back and relax, Mariann's is the place for you!
Beautiful and peaceful. Enjoyed the hot tub. Perfect for a relaxing weekend girls retreat.

This cottage is more than you can ask for! The location is so private and cozy. The drive there is relaxing. The water flowing is so peaceful and the outdoor patio is well equipped with seating and heaters for the winter time. Heaters all over! Spent the weekend here with my mom and sisters and we all enjoyed it. The room’s upstairs have amazing views and the queen bed is SO comfy. Stairs are a little steep but it’s manageable. The entire house has everything you’ll need. Felt at home.
The owner went above and beyond to welcome us into her home and had great communication throughout. Very friendly! I would love to see this place again in the summer. Highly recommend!!
My boyfriend and I absolutely loved this place and look forward to coming back in the future!

The pictures don’t do this place justice! Marianne was very courteous and helpful. Plenty of hiking around before and past the place. Load up with all you might need in a bigger town so you can spend more time enjoying. Will come back to see other seasons!

This beautiful gem is well loved, and we were happy to enjoy it for four nights! It’s definitely for folks who know each other as this sweet place is small in stature. But being right on the river and having a fantastic outdoors area and hot tub means that the inside is really just a means to the outside. Note that the bedrooms have 3/4 walls so you are able to easily hear over the wall! Not for people who need privacy. Also it is a dog friendly place so for those with allergies it’s not your place

This cabin is more spacious and comfortable than we imagined. There is plenty of sitting and lounging space. Indoor and outdoor heaters, hot tub, great water pressure, delicious fresh water (I think filtered from the river?) and it's right on the river! The cabin's beach is a great launch point if you want to meet a friend down river. Great local pizza joint and plenty of trails nearby. If you're wanting a break from the city with plenty of conveniences within a 15 minute drive, this is the perfect place for you!

Wonderful hidden gem. Clean, quiet and a relaxing place. Internet was slow but there are a lot of things that will keep the family busy and entertained. We will definitely book again. Mariann is very friendly and on top of everything, she checks on us and make sure that we are ok.
Really special and wonderful place. Right next to the river. Mariann was very helpful and understanding throughout the stay. Will definitely come back when the weather is nicer

10 out of 5 stars. First off the cabin itself is adorable and the hot tub is a cherry on top. The location of the cabin is perfect. Right next to the river and secluded away all by yourself. It feels like it’s only you out there. But the real reason this place is so great is because of the owners. They went above and beyond what most hosts would do. Long story short, Mother Nature decided to have an ice storm the day before and the morning before we got there, knocked out the electricity to the surrounding area, froze the water and broke their water pump line. They put us up in a hotel, paid for our dinner and refunded us a night. Bob stayed out all night fixing things and we were able to check in the next morning. So these hosts went way above and beyond to take care of us when something out of their control happened. So between an amazing location and even more amazing hosts we will definitely be back again. I highly recommend this spot to anyone and everyone.
Exactly like the photos plus some. We will definitely be coming again! You couldn't ask for a more simple getaway with such an incredible view out every window.

This is a beautiful place. I highly recommend booking here. Mariann is extremely helpful and very responsive. The cottage is even more beautiful than the pictures and the scenery is peaceful. This is a great place to unplug for a while and enjoy nature.

Bayou d our expectations! The pictures honestly doesn’t do the beauty of this place justice! Every day we felt like we woke up in a fairytale, and the host Mariann is so responsive, and extremely accommodating. Probably THE BEST Airbnb experience I’ve had yet! We definitely plan on coming back in the summer!
Great place easy communication !!

Second time back at this place ❤️ It’s incredibly serene and peaceful.
The internet is unreliable at best out here so both times we’ve planned for phone free and screen free weekends - this time was no exception! It’s very easy to do since there are board games galore!

This house is awesome. We really enjoyed the beautiful views, which were visible from everywhere in the house! It was very clean and had everything we needed and more, which we really appreciated and made us feel right at home. The host is super friendly and quick to respond!
It was so awesome to have a beach to a beautiful river right in our back yard! This house is very secluded and peaceful.. you really can’t help but just relax.
We drove to the two nearest restaurants which was a beautiful 10-15minute drive. Both restaurants had great food, drinks and vibe.
There are a ton of hiking trails just a short drive away and they have stunning views of rivers, waterfalls, trees and cliffs..
We hope to stay here in the future! Our kids would have a blast swimming and exploring here in the summer!
Such a cute, idyllic spot near the river. Mariann adds the cutest touches, too!

This place is extraordinary. I had a blast there in the middle of a storm. I can only imagine how great it would be on summer. Cannot wait to go back. The complimentary bottle of wine waiting for you at check in was an awesome touch.
This was a beautiful location. We enjoyed our stay!
Lovely cabin by the river. We enjoyed feeling cozy and secluded during the stay. Cabin is stocked with everything you might need and the owner was communicative and easy to work with.

This was our second trip to the River Cottage and let me just say, this place is magical. We have stayed in a lot of Air BNBs over the years and there is something about this one that just keeps us coming back! I think what sets it apart from other Air BNBs is that as soon as you walk it, you can tell this place is loved. The owners truly care about this space. The beds are super, super comfy, the kitchen is stocked with coffee, spices and pancake mix, there are games to play, a cozy couch to snuggle on and watch a movie... there is even a cabinet that has water shoes to make walking into the river more comfortable! It really feels like a home away from home! Thank you for sharing this special place with all of us Mariann!
This place was an amazing little oasis. Beautiful cabin, with all the necessities and then some. Comfortable beds, awesome fire pit....truly so much to rave about! We will definitely be back.

This is the 3rd time I've stayed here this year, and it is perfect in every season. Lucky to have caught the last of the warm weather so we could get good use of the river floaties, decks, yard games, and fire pit! I get better sleep here than at home, honestly.

My husband and I had a great time celebrating our anniversary at this beautifully private and serene cottage. We will definitely be coming back for another romantic getaway - might even bring the kid next time to play in the river!
The cabin is beautiful and the creak is breathtaking!

Wow!!! This place is amazing!!! I am an outdoor lover. And if you are too, you will LOVE this place as well. It’s so cozy. And the river is sooo relaxing and beautiful! We were able to go for a beautiful hike just minutes away and then went to a local winery But truly just staying at the cottage all day was my husband’s favorite thing to do. We grilled out. Roasted s’mores on the fire. Drank wine on the deck. And just took in all the natural beauty all around. Mariann did an amazing job of having everything there that you could possibly need. I only wish the place were my own because my husband and I absolutely adored it there!!! You will too!!!

What a beautiful spot on the river. Quiet and relaxing. We took full advantage of all the outdoor spaces — decks with outdoor furniture, lounge chairs on the rocky shore — to unwind and enjoy the beauty and birds.
Mariann made things easy. Great communication. A terrific escape for us.

This was a great little escape. I'm sure in the heat of summer it'll be even better! My friend and I had a lovely time relaxing by the water and hanging out on the deck listening to the water. The stairs/ladder to the bedrooms is a bit daunting when tipsy so be very careful. I initially had brought two of my 5 dogs but they're prissy girls and since there's no grass for their business they were determined to hold it. I wasn't Ok with that so I ended up taking the two hour drive home to switch puppers to my two corgis who are no so picky. Even in the dark the place was easy to find again and I was able to make a necessary stop at Safeway on my way back to get breakfast foods. Overall it was a great experience and I want to come back when the weather is more river temp complimentary.
Cabin was very cozy and the private river area was perfect with our own little swimming hole. The kitchen was very equipped which was a bonus!

Our stay here was so wonderful!
The river was fresh and the house is cozy :)
This spot is definitely a place you could revisit and never get bored of. Mariann was so communicative and answered any questions we had and even threw in a bunch of complimentary gifts. We had a wonderful time <3 10/10

Great place with great views, we had to be extra cautious with our toddler since it is not toddler friendly but overall a great stay! Mariann did provide all the amenities and communication was on point. Would definitely revisit.
A gem!
Beautiful place on the banks of a river with no one around to disturb your peace. Everything was well thought it and all you would need for a lovely time tucked away in nature. Highly recommended.
Amazing little cottage! Had pretty much all the amenities that we needed, and was private. We had a great time on the river. We will definitely book again.

We loved our stay just as much or even more than last time! This is just a special, serene place and is quickly becoming our favorite place to relax, unplug and unwind! The cabin is adorable and has everything you could possibly need! The setting is breathtaking and we can’t wait to come back! Thanks again Mariann, you are the most amazing host we’ve ever dealt with!

This river cabin is serene, clean and so cute and comfortable! Mariann offers so many great extras that enhance the experience, like games, firewood, pantry items, extra blankets etc.
It feels like home when you visit!
The views are phenomenal and although there are many activities in the area you won’t want to leave the cabin because there’s so much to enjoy!

This place is awesome. Small. Quaint. But everything you need and more. Host had vinyl boats and inner tubes all ready for guest. Several spots to sit and enjoy the river going by. Highly recommend this place to anyone wanting a little get away or a family with kids,, grandkids, etc. to vacation. Great swimming. Very relaxing location and very very private.

Such a lovely river front cabin and a great host. Mariann provides everything you need for a fun and restful stay. Check in was smooth and easy and Mariann checked in regularly to make sure we had everything we needed. The multiple decks and river front furniture ensure you can stretch out and relax in multiple spots. Everything was clean and tidy upon arrival. The stairs leading upstairs are indeed steep as the description points out so folks with small ones and/or mobility issues should definitely take note.

I can’t even put into words how much Mariann went out of her way to make my daughters and now son-in-laws wedding night so special. Forever grateful and will most definitely be back. The kids didn’t even want to leave for their honeymoon and just wanted to stay here for the week ❤️

The River Cottage is one of those fantastic places that you even have a hard time believing exists and that you're there. The cottage is very cozy, comfortable, and well prepared, you'll find everything. The river is beautiful. The private beach is perfect. We went in the summer and it was great, but the cottage must be amazing in winter also, just to sit but the fire and soak it all in. I couldn't recommend more.

Stunning property on a serene and private part of the Lewis River! My fiancée and I spent two nights here and it far exceeded our expectations. Pretty much everything you could ever need is provided. Comfortable beds, comfortable couch, great shower. We loved being able to sit outside with coffee and tea and play some games while listening to the sounds of the river. The ladder to get up to the upstairs is not for everyone, but it wasn't an issue for us. Convenient to much of Mt. St. Helens with Moulton and Yacult Falls right down the road. We would stay here again for sure!!
Definitely worth the money. The house is great with all of its decks and Balconys, but the property is top notch and elevates the whole place.
This is an one of kind Airbnb experience! Everything is perfect! We will definitely be back.
It’s perfect. Peaceful and cozy - we will be back!

Great base from which to explore the nearby waterfalls or venture further afield around the Mt. St Helen's area. It's unique/rare to find a private "river beach", which makes this place very special - the light plays and sounds of the rushing water are wonderful, and my dog loved splashing about! The house is well stocked with pretty much every piece of gear in every room that you'd want (e.g., even a pre-seasoned cast iron pan). The multiple decks/corners allow for plenty of opportunity to hang out outside. Communications with Mariann were rapid and clear. The stairs were not for my dog, however there's a pullout sofa in the living room for those situations. I would definitely stay again.

Mariann’s little slice of heaven is one of the best Airbnb stays I’ve ever experienced aside from “Rose’s Point Roberts” Heaven on earth experience. Mariann has created a fantastic private tranquility retreat with everything you could possibly need or want. I would give the river cottage a 10-star if I could. We are looking forward for our next visit! I more than recommend her river cottage! I say make it a MUST-Bucket-list experience! We are still in awe. 🥹

Mariann’s amenity list was off the chart. It was so great to visit an exclusive cottage on the river that had lots of things at the site to do. We played chess, watched movies and played other games. The access to the river was great, right there. We enjoyed the very private feeling this cottage offers. We couldn’t see our hear anyone else. We stayed at the cottage for our entire visit. This was a great place for us and our kids to visit. We have a son who’s almost 16 and other kids in the single digits and they all had fun, sun bathing or splashing in the river. I would recommend this to others, but I don’t want to lose my spot. Thank you Mariann for providing a great place for us to unplug and unwind. We’re booking again!

Wow. What a great spot on the river. So many options for enjoying the space. Yes, it would be amazing on a warm, sunny day (which we did not have), to be able to enjoy all the outdoor spaces and decks and playing in the river itself right out your backdoor! But even in rainy, chilly weather, the space was so cozy and welcoming. A gas fireplace in the living room and an electric 'wood stove' for warmth and ambiance in the kitchen and in one upstairs bedroom. Both bedrooms with lovely views of the river from bed! And the hanging chair swing on one bedroom deck overlooking the passing river was such luxury! Communication and cleanliness both excellent. The one thing we would have changed if we could was to have more views of the river while seated in the living room and dining area. The furniture positioning didn't take full advantage of all the windows and views available. But that's really only an issue if you can't spend a lot of your time outdoors, like we couldn't. Regardless, the space feels very private and surrounded by forest and river and nature sounds and lots of cozy nooks and options for views upstairs and outside. Lovely visit! Thanks, Mariann!
This place is in a beautiful area and cozy and comfortable inside. Mariann is great—responsive and detailed. Easy recommendation to make for your next getaway!
Great little spot! The river was so pretty and the house was super relaxing in the rain. Very cozy and perfect for a quick two person, two night stay.

A perfectly secluded, wonderfully spacious, and simply the best for a little getaway outside the city. The river access is absolutely amazing! I loved being able to just enjoy the sound of the rushing water from the patio in the morning. The perfect view with my morning coffee. I cannot suggest this place enough. I already bragged to all my friends and family about this place, most are already looking to book their next trip here.

This is an amazing place on an incredible piece of property! We had a fantastic time enjoying the place, the river, exploring the surrounding area (lots of hiking, waterfalls, and wineries) and did a day trip to Mt St Helen’s. Great adventuring and will definitely visit again!

This spot is breathtaking. Stairs are steep--my dog managed to go down them, not up though... maybe next time! Two very slight possible issues: (1) VERY STEEP driveway that is easy to miss even in the daylight, (2) the entire cabin is more or less one room (loft like), so light sleepers with noisy family members might find the lack of full walls to be an issue. All the good: Kitchen was very well stocked. Grill on the deck was awesome. Decks galore!!! Great fire pit options. Extremely dog friendly. Gorgeous river. Green! loved our stay. If you want charm + nature + river + amazing outdoor lounge space... 100, A+, book it!
Love this place! This is our second year staying there, and planning for it again next year.
Beautiful, clean, and cozy! My second stay here. I’ll be back!

This was a return visit and just as perfect as the last time. Mariann got a new couch and coffee tables and hanging chair since we were last there which are lovely. As always, very well stocked kitchen for cooking!

great place to stay if you are into getting away from it all, the steep stairs which you find in most small cabins of this type are easy if you remember to just use them as a ladder going up and down.
What a wonderful spot on the river - clean, quiet, and *so* comfortable. The place was just as the pictures show and is the perfect spot for a weekend getaway - I will definitely be visiting again!

An incredible get away. Mariann is a great host and communicator. The views are beautiful and the home is cozy. We had everything we needed and the complimentary bottle of wine was a cherry on top. Do not hesitate to stay here
Beautiful location with amazing views and surroundings. It rained while we were there and there sound of the rain on the roof was magical.
Beautiful secluded location. Pictures really don’t do it justice. As many reviews have said the stairs are a beast but we managed just fine. Well worth it for the cute spot and fun location.
Mariann was a wonderful host and was very speedy with response. The cabin is as lovely as the pictures show. Waking up to the sound of river is truly magical.

I can’t believe how beautiful and secluded this place is :). Perfect for an isolated/couple/family/friends getaway into the outdoors. Hiking park and local winery within the neighborhood a 5-10min drive. Or, the house is perfect for buying groceries and not leaving the property (which is what I did). You can’t beat the seclusion, the scenery, and how close it is to the River. I came in late March so it was perfect for bundled up coffee in the morning, sun bathing in the afternoon, and wine by the fire at night. I would like to come back when it’s warmer to cook more outside and enjoy the water a little :)
Host very responsive and helpful!
Dog Owner Note: She has pointed out in the description that the stairs are very ladder-like. Due to last minute family stuff, my furry friend wasn’t able to come with me because we love going hiking together (the house is very dog-friendly). However, I was a little relieved that he wasn’t there with me because he’s 50lbs, and there was no way he’d get up and down the stairs, and he has a need to sleep on the floor next to my bed in a new place, so I wouldn’t have been able to enjoy the comfortable bed and balconies upstairs with him. He would’ve cried and whined that we were somewhere new and separated. The recliner downstairs is super comfortable tho and I would’ve just slept there had he come with me and it would’ve been fine :)
Mariann and Bob are amazing! We loved staying near the river and exploring the local area. It was cold but beautiful. Highly recommend!
Gorgeous! We will be coming back!

the cabin is a magical place even in winter, the little house is very warm, cozy and clean, the owner has gone to great lengths to make every detail perfect. the river is very beautiful even when it rains and it is cold.
I will definitely have to go back in the summer.
The best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in! Perfect for a romantic getaway. Mariann thought of everything we could ever need. The spot is GORGEOUS and the house is so beautiful.

This was truly the perfect getaway from my busy life. Mariann’s place is definitely way better than the pictures let on. The kitchen was well stocked, it was clean, warm, and the view of the river is breathtaking. Can’t wait to stay again.

Absolutely amazing!! Mariann was very quick to respond to any questions I had, and made the entire experience more amazing. She had the heaters on and Firewood for us when we arrived, and it made the cottage feel like a dream come true. It was better than I could have hoped for, and made me not want to leave! We will definitely be back!!!

Everything you could have asked for an Airbnb. Spent our ten year anniversary here and it was a dream. Great location close to great places to explore. House was cozy, beautiful and had anything you needed. Can’t wait to share this place with our kids this summer.

Wonderful place, away form it all, but also close enough to whatever you may need - hiking, exploring, or just sitting and watching the river go by.
Great space, with all the amenities.

This is probably my favorite place that I've stayed within 2 hours of Portland. The site is gorgeous, the house is very cute and comfy and well-stocked, and there are lovely easy to access hikes all around.
This spot is a gem. Right on the river, cozy beds, beautiful forest. The hosts were great communicators. We look forward to returning in the summer.

This property is hands down the best Airbnb property I’ve ever stayed in! The location is stunning - we can’t wait to come back again in the summer and go swimming in the river. Additionally, Mariann has gone 200% above and beyond to make sure everything you can possibly need is available! Our dog LOVED being able to play around the property.
Thank you for sharing this retreat and experience with us!
Beautiful home right on the river. Very clean and cozy! I highly recommend it!

We absolutely enjoyed our time at this magical cabin. Everything was fantastic, quiet, clean, and cozy. We will keep your place in our memories and hopefully return when the weather is warmer! Thank you for everything and for allowing our family to make wonderful memories.

This cottage is excellent for small groups. I brought 2 guests and my dog. Plenty of space, yet cozy. The Kitchen was well stocked with spices & utensils. No lack of entertainment with Wifi, TV with Streaming, and board games. Easy to unplug at this cabin. The river views were great from the multiple decks. We went for a cozy Winter stay, but the swimming during the Summer is probably excellent. Yacolt & Amboy are nice little towns, we highly recommend Nick's for breakfast.

As advertised! We loved our time there

We will be going back, our favorite stay we’ve had.

Mariann was very prompt and responsive to questions, and overall we can't say enough great things about the place. A true gem. Thanks for allowing us to stay at your River Cottage Mariann!

The river cottage was beautiful and comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked with everything we needed. The little touches made it very welcoming for us. This was perfect! Quiet and private. Got to step away from life and enjoy the family uninterrupted. You can expect beautiful cottage, private river access and making lots of fun memories!!!
A lovely, picturesque cabin on the river! Photos don’t do this place justice - all the essentials are included, and being so close to the water was a treat. Wonderful stay.

- The Queen bed was a bit too soft for us (both in our early 30s) - with two people, we felt sort of like we were falling into the middle. The Full bed is very firm and comfortable! So we ended up sleeping on that even though it's smaller.
Thank you Mariann!
